name: Agenda Creation and Refinement
description: Many more people proposed great sessions than we have time for-- here is where the horse-trading, session merging, and schedule-fine-tuning happen, COLLECTIVELY and HORIZONTALLY.

speakers.name: Bumblefudge
speakers.bio: Janitor @ Chain Agnostic Standards Alliance, Standards Coordinator for Protocol Labs, Advisor @Wallet Connect, and a little freelancing as a treat.  Passionate about non-monetary coordination, public goods, and worker-owned cooperatives, whether those are called DAOs or not.
